note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Death rate from cardiovascular diseases
subtitle: Reported annual death rate from [cardiovascular diseases](#dod:cvd) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.

display.name: Age-standardized deaths that are from cardiovascular diseases per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged all ages
